charges.charge_description: 18:1153 and 113(a)(6) (CIR - Assault Resulting in Serious Bodily Injury)(1)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to BOP for a term of THREE HUNDRED (300) MONTHS, which consists of ONE HUNDRED TWENTY (120) MONTHS on Count 1, ONE HUNDRED TWENTY (120) MONTHS on Count 2 and THREE HUNDRED (300) MONTHS on Count 3, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of FIVE (5) YEARS, which consists of THREE (3) YEARS on Count 1, THREE (3) YEARS on Count 2 and FIVE (5) YEARS on Count 3, said counts to run concurrently.

charges.charge_description: 18:1153 and 113(a)(3) (CIR - Assault With a Dangerous Weapon)(2)

charges.charge_disposition: Dft is committed to BOP for a term of THREE HUNDRED (300) MONTHS, which consists of ONE HUNDRED TWENTY (120) MONTHS on Count 1, ONE HUNDRED TWENTY (120) MONTHS on Count 2 and THREE HUNDRED (300) MONTHS on Count 3, said counts to run concurrently, with credit for time served. Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of FIVE (5) YEARS, which consists of THREE (3) YEARS on Count 1, THREE (3) YEARS on Count 2 and FIVE (5) YEARS on Count 3, said counts to run concurrently.

Upon release from imprisonment, dft shall be placed on supervised release for a term of FIVE (5) YEARS, which consists of THREE (3) YEARS on Count 1, THREE (3) YEARS on Count 2 and FIVE (5) YEARS on Count 3, said counts to run concurrently.
